columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the stack.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name associated with the stack.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the stack.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time at which the stack was created.

columns.name: disable_rollback
columns.description: Boolean to enable or disable rollback on stack creation failures.

columns.name: enable_termination_protection
columns.description: Specifies whether termination protection is enabled for the stack.

columns.name: last_updated_time
columns.description: The time the stack was last updated. This field will only be returned if the stack has been updated at least once.

columns.name: parent_id
columns.description: ID of the direct parent of this stack.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that is associated with the stack.

columns.name: root_id
columns.description: ID of the top-level stack to which the nested stack ultimately belongs.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A user-defined description associated with the stack.

columns.name: notification_arns
columns.description: SNS topic ARNs to which stack related events are published.

columns.name: outputs
columns.description: A list of output structures.

columns.name: rollback_configuration
columns.description: The rollback triggers for AWS CloudFormation to monitor during stack creation and updating operations, and for the specified monitoring period afterwards.

columns.name: capabilities
columns.description: The capabilities allowed in the stack.

columns.name: stack_drift_status
columns.description: Status of the stack's actual configuration compared to its expected template configuration.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: A list of Parameter structures.

columns.name: template_body
columns.description: Structure containing the template body.

columns.name: template_body_json
columns.description: Structure containing the template body. Parsed into json object for better readability.

columns.name: resources
columns.description: A list of Stack resource structures.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with stack.
